title: How to Contact Eric Trump via Phone, Email, & Social Media

steps.title: Eric Trump doesn’t have a public phone number or email address.
steps.content: Eric Trump doesn’t have a public phone number or email address. Unfortunately, there isn’t a direct way to call or email Eric Trump. In 2014, his official email was etrump@trumporg.com , but it is no longer in use. [1] X Research source You can, however, write a letter to the Trump Organization (since Eric is the Executive Vice President). There’s no guarantee he will receive your letter, but it’s always worth a shot! [2] X Research source The Trump Organization Executive Offices: 115 Eagle Tree Terrace Jupiter, FL, 33477

steps.title: Reach out to Eric Trump on X, Instagram, or Facebook.
steps.content: Reach out to Eric Trump on X, Instagram, or Facebook. You can connect with Eric on his X account ( @EricTrump ), Instagram account ( @erictrump ), or Facebook page ( Eric Trump ). These are the only official pages run by Eric and his team. [3] X Research source Try tagging him in one of your photos, leaving a comment on his posts, or sending him a direct message! Keep in mind that Eric probably won't personally respond to your DMs. A member of his staff might send a reply, or they may ignore your message entirely.

steps.title: Eric Trump is an American businessman and the third child of Donald Trump.
steps.content: Eric Trump is an American businessman and the third child of Donald Trump. Currently, Eric is the Executive Vice President of the Trump Organization, overseeing global real estate development, management, and operations. He’s also responsible for the rapid growth and expansion of Trump Golf, Trump Hotels, Trump International Realty, Trump Winery, the Mar-a-Lago Club, estate properties, and other commercial assets and ventures. [4] X Research source Birthday: January 6, 1984 Place of birth: New York, NY Height: 6’ 5” Parents: Donald Trump and Ivana Trump Siblings: Donald Trump Jr., Ivanka Trump, Barron Trump, and Tiffany Trump Spouse: Lara Trump Children: Eric Luke Trump and Carolina Dorothy Trump Education: The Hill School, Trinity School, and Georgetown University

steps.title: Mail a letter, send an email, or contact the Trump Organization on social media.
steps.content: Mail a letter, send an email, or contact the Trump Organization on social media. If you have a business or real estate development proposal, send a letter with your contact information to 725 Fifth Avenue, New York, NY, 10022. For press inquiries and information, send an email to press@trumporg.com . Alternatively, you can reach out to the Trump Organization on their official social media pages: [5] X Research source X Instagram Facebook
